verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H3128>Jonathelemrechokim<s%>, <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>took<s%> him in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>. Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, O <S%H430>God<s%>: for <S%H582>man<s%> would swallow me <S%H7602>up<s%>; he <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H3905>oppresseth<s%> me. Michtam: or, A golden Psalm of David
Mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%> would <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me up: for they be <S%H7227>many<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against me, O thou most <S%H4791>High<s%>. enemies: Heb. observers
What <S%H3117>time<s%> I am <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, I will <S%H982>trust<s%> in thee.

In <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, in <S%H430>God<s%> I have put my <S%H982>trust<s%>; I will not <S%H3372>fear<s%> what <S%H1320>flesh<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me.
Every <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6087>wrest<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>: all their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are against me for <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
They gather themselves <S%H1481>together<s%>, they <S%H6845>hide<s%> <S%H6845><s%> themselves, they <S%H8104>mark<s%> my <S%H6119>steps<s%>, when they <S%H6960>wait<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Shall they <S%H6405>escape<s%> by <S%H205>iniquity<s%>? in thine <S%H639>anger<s%> cast <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>.
Thou <S%H5608>tellest<s%> my <S%H5112>wanderings<s%>: <S%H7760>put<s%> thou my <S%H1832>tears<s%> into thy <S%H4997>bottle<s%>: are they not in thy <S%H5612>book<s%>?
<S%H3117>When<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee, then shall mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>: this I <S%H3045>know<s%>; for <S%H430>God<s%> is for me.
In <S%H430>God<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>: in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>.
In <S%H430>God<s%> have I put my <S%H982>trust<s%>: I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> what <S%H120>man<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me.
Thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> are upon me, O <S%H430>God<s%>: I will <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H8426>praises<s%> unto thee.

For thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>: wilt not thou deliver my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling<s%>, that I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>?
